summary: Frontend Team Lead with 12+ years of experience building scalable web applications for international clients across e-commerce, IoT, and decentralized platforms. Proven track record of leading engineering teams, architecting micro-frontend systems, and delivering high-performance applications. Deep expertise in React, TypeScript, Next.js, and modern JavaScript ecosystems. Experienced in mentoring developers, establishing testing practices, and driving technical excellence across cross-functional teams.

experience.title: Frontend Team Lead
experience.description: Lead frontend engineering team for enterprise consulting project, managing technical architecture and team performance. Oversee micro-frontend implementation using Lit web components and TypeScript.
achievements: Lead team of 7 frontend engineers, conducting code reviews and architecture decisions
Architected micro-frontend system improving deployment independence and team scalability
Mentor engineers on advanced TypeScript patterns, web components, and system design
Manage stakeholder communications and technical roadmap planning
Establish testing strategies and CI/CD pipelines for quality assurance

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Built production-grade user interfaces for decentralized hosting platform serving developers deploying Web3 applications. Worked in fully asynchronous remote team across multiple time zones.
achievements: Developed core UI components for decentralized hosting platform using React and Next.js
Integrated AI-powered features using LangChain, improving developer experience
Implemented state management with Zustand for complex application state
Collaborated asynchronously with distributed team across 6+ time zones
Optimized application bundle size and performance for web3 workflows

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Architected and developed high-performance web applications using Next.js and TypeScript for carbon management platform. Led frontend optimization efforts for performance, accessibility, and SEO.
achievements: Built enterprise dashboard with Next.js achieving 95+ Lighthouse performance scores
Implemented comprehensive testing suite with Jest and React Testing Library (85% coverage)
Optimized Core Web Vitals reducing LCP by 40% and improving SEO rankings
Conducted technical code reviews ensuring architectural consistency
Delivered WCAG 2.1 AA compliant interfaces for accessibility compliance

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
experience.description: Delivered enterprise-grade frontend solutions for major international clients including Vodafone Germany, Ibersol Group, and Dreamlines cruise platform. Led technical initiatives and mentored junior engineers.
achievements: Architected and executed WordPress to React migration for Vodafone Germany, reducing load times by 60%
Established comprehensive testing strategy (Jest, Testing Library, Cypress) reducing production bugs by 45%
Led technical interviews and mentored 3 junior developers, improving team velocity
Delivered cruise booking platform for Dreamlines handling 10K+ daily transactions
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins automating deployment processes

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
experience.description: Architected frontend solutions for Anova's IoT petrochemical monitoring platform and YOOX Net-a-Porter's luxury e-commerce site (The Outnet). Led micro-frontend architecture implementation.
achievements: Architected micro-frontend system for The Outnet enabling independent team deployments
Integrated CoreMedia CMS for editorial content serving 2M+ monthly visitors
Built real-time IoT dashboard for Anova monitoring 500+ industrial sensors
Reduced frontend bundle size by 35% through code-splitting and lazy loading optimization
Mentored 4 junior developers on React patterns and testing best practices

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
experience.description: Delivered POC for Plinth, migrating from Angular 4 to React. Worked on AngularJS to React migration for Statful.
achievements: Successfully migrated applications from Angular/AngularJS to React
Applied testing strategies with Selenium, Cypress, and Jest
Promoted Agile practices and collaborated closely with design and backend teams
Developed new features and improved application architecture

experience.title: IT Consultant
experience.description: Built a web-based TV application for Vodafone Portugal using AngularJS. Worked on feature development and migration from AngularJS to React for Statful.
achievements: Developed web-based TV application for Vodafone Portugal
Implemented testing strategies using Jasmine, Cypress, and Selenium
Maintained and optimized HTML5, SASS and JS codebases
Contributed to AngularJS to React migration efforts

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Worked on websites, dashboards, and Android applications, catering to diverse company needs.
achievements: Maintained codebases and contributed to frontend improvements
Enhanced application performance and user experience
Developed Android applications alongside web projects

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Internship developing an eCommerce website using WordPress.
achievements: Developed eCommerce website facilitating online sales and customer engagement
Applied SEO best practices for improved search visibility
